item.title: Britain's a Nice Place to Go
item.description: Britain’s a Nice Place to Go It’s an ideal mix of being foreign enough without making you feel like a tourist due to language and culture barrier.

item.title: Britain's Super Classist
item.description: Britain’s Super Classist Related To: , [[Social Hierarchy|Class]] Talking is used to display class. People wish to associate with people of similar class.

item.title: Consider Studying in Britain for Your Master's
item.description: Consider Studying in Britain for Your Master’s Related To: , [[Master’s Degree]] It might be shorter, be cheaper, and schools are still quite good.
